name: Pet Clinic: Match 3 & Design
description:
Do you love cute and fluffy pets? Then welcome to Pet Clinic - FREE match-3 puzzle game where you can be the best pet doctor in town!

Restore and decorate an old house to turn it into a modern vet hospital for cute pets with many exciting rooms. Play fun match-3 levels and let the story unfold.

Become friends with the charming vet Oliver, together you will redesign the clinic, make new friends, help lovely animals and rescue stray cats and dogs to find them a new home.

One day at a time brings you closer to a dream pet paradise. Pet Clinic unveils a beautiful storyline with fascinating twists and intriguing characters.

Features of Pet Clinic

*Hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 level

*Colorful toys to combine, powerful boosters to blast

*Story-based gameplay with exciting tasks

*Many house and garden design options for you to choose from

*A unique experience with veterinary clinic decoration and performing vet services

*Adorable animals to help, rescue and play with: cats and kittens, dogs and puppies, hamsters, guinea pigs, and many other animal friends

*Dozens of characters in an interesting and unpredictable storyline

*Your pet raccoon as a funny companion throughout the adventure in town

*3D animation and 360° screen rotation for the best gaming experience

*Offline mode to restore the house, solve puzzles, design rooms and help animals anywhere you go

Bring life to an abandoned mansion. Redesign it while matching puzzles and creating a dream home makeover for animals, and do not let the only veterinary clinic in town get shut down.

Your main task is to build important vet facilities such as operation room, laboratory, garden renovation, and design fun areas: grooming room, pet café, animal playground, and more!

Design rooms with pretty furniture in unique styles, add interior details and animal accessories. Open more rooms and help all the pets: cats, dogs, rodents, reptiles and others to make themselves at home. Take care of fluffy animals, become friends with lovely characters, and engage in a storyline, which is perfect for all pet lovers.

Play with friends! Share lives and build your pet clinic faster.
